org.apache.sshd.client.scp

Interface CloseableScpClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Channel, ClientSessionHolder, Closeable, ScpClient, SessionHolder<ClientSession>

    public interface CloseableScpClient
extends ScpClient, Channel
    An ScpClient wrapper that also closes the underlying session when closed
    Author:
    Apache MINA SSHD Project
